document.full_text: a big majority of egyptians approved amendments to the constitution in a referendum, results showed, opening the door to early elections seen as favoring islamists and figures affiliated with the old ruling party.
document.title: egypt approves reforms in historic referendum
lines_and_colors: a big majority of egyptians approved amendments to the constitution in a referendum, results showed, opening the door to early elections seen as favoring islamists and figures affiliated with the old ruling party.
